title: Labtop or pc Potatoes can't run league of legends no more
body:
On the old client lol could run potatoes with no problem. I was getting 70-90 FPSMarksman on my potato of a labtop , but now I'm getting 10-15 FPSMarksman in low settings. Are u serious.....

Rip potatoes

replies.body: Sometimes after patches, you might need to update a few other things to make sure they interact in the best way with League. I'd suggest double checking your drivers, and make sure to go through the other steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) too. Hit me back if nothing is helping though!
